casebody.data:
Darrell E. JACKSON, a Married Man ; Thomas M Strawn, Jr., a Married Man ; and Andrew S. Levy, a Married Man, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Linda Marie Bell, District Judge, Respondents,
and
The State of Nevada Department of Transportation, Real Party in Interest. No. 76033 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 17, 2018

Dismissed.
